imdb.plot outline: The comedy team that brought you, "The School" and "Saturday School", team up again in this up-roaring offensive Skit Show that reminded America why Tyler Jacobs and Ian MacKenzie are best friends. Enjoy fun skits like, "Joe Johnson; The Master of Calm", or watch Tyler build a laptop in 6 seconds, or if you get really bored, watch the exciting adventures of "Paralyzed man".
imdb.title: Brotherly Love, BL
